LanguageData.SPL.BillHelp: (이 레시피 유형을 선택하기 전에 먼저 필터를 지운 다음 씨앗를 선택합니다.)
LanguageData.SPL.RequiresRestart: The following settings require a game restart:
LanguageData.SPL.Settings.MarketValueModifier: Market value modifier (Mod default: {0}, Min: {1}, Max: {2}):
LanguageData.SPL.Settings.MarketValueModifier.Desc: The market value of seeds is multiplied by this value. Reduce this if you want cheaper seeds to buy.
LanguageData.SPL.Settings.SeedExtractionModifier: Seed extraction modifier (Mod default: {0}, Min: {1}, Max: {2}):
LanguageData.SPL.Settings.SeedExtractionModifier.Desc: The amount of seeds extracted from produce is multiplied by this value. Most extractions are {0} by default.
LanguageData.SPL.Settings.SeedFactorModifier: Seed factor modifier (Mod default: {0}, Min: {1}, Max: {2}):
LanguageData.SPL.Settings.SeedFactorModifier.Desc: The number of seeds a plant will normally yield is multiplied by this value. Most plants drop {0} seed by default, with a bonus roll for more.
LanguageData.SPL.Settings.NoUselessSeeds.Desc: If enabled, traders will not sell seeds that are unable to grow within any map that you own.
LanguageData.SPL.Settings.ClearSnow.Desc: If enabled, pawns will clear any snow greater than 20% deep before sowing. This feature is optional and exists more for aesthetics and realism purposes.
LanguageData.SPL.Settings.EdibleSeeds.Desc: If enabled, seeds can be eaten by any animal that would eat hay.\n\nChanging this requires a game restart to rebuild the seed database.
LanguageData.SPL.Settings.ReloadNeeded: The game will need to be reloaded in order to reprocess the def detabase for the adding/removing of seeds.
LanguageData.SPL.Settings.SeedlessDesc: Define which plants do not need seeds (unharvestable plants cannot be changed).
LanguageData.SPL.Settings.LabelsDesc: Rename the labels for seeds with your own (feature currently disabled).
